text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia oblongula is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope)
United Kingdom Exclusive Economic Zone
text.References: Marshall, J. T. (1895). New British marine shells. Journal of Malacology. 4: 35-39
